places_to_visit.name: The Pearl-Qatar
places_to_visit.description: The Pearl-Qatar is an artificial island with luxury residences, upscale shopping, and dining options. It features picturesque canals, elegant architecture, and waterfront promenades.

places_to_visit.name: Museum of Islamic Art
places_to_visit.description: The Museum of Islamic Art houses one of the world's most comprehensive collections of Islamic art. The museum's stunning architecture and exhibits offer insights into Islamic history and culture.

places_to_visit.name: Souq Waqif
places_to_visit.description: Souq Waqif is a traditional market in Doha where visitors can explore shops selling spices, textiles, jewelry, and handicrafts. It’s a vibrant place to experience local culture and cuisine.

places_to_visit.name: Doha Corniche
places_to_visit.description: The Doha Corniche is a waterfront promenade offering scenic views of the Persian Gulf and the city skyline. It's a popular spot for walks, picnics, and enjoying the beautiful sunset.

places_to_visit.name: Katara Cultural Village
places_to_visit.description: Katara Cultural Village is a cultural center featuring theaters, galleries, and performance spaces. It hosts various cultural events, exhibitions, and festivals, showcasing Qatar's heritage.
